properties.verseOrder: c1 c2 v1 c1 c2 v2 c1 c2 v3 c1 c2 v4 c1 c2 v5 c1 c2 v6 c1 c2

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Yanipasa kumshukuru
Mungu wangu
aliye niumba
na kunifanya jinsi
nilivyo. x2

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Kaniumba mwili na roho,
(Hiya)
kanipa uhai na nguvu, (Hiya)
lazima ni msifu yeye, (Hiya)
ingawa mimi ni mnyonge (Hiya)
lazima ni msifu Mungu wangu,
nyakabidhi na maisha yangu
yawe mikononi mwake.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Nitamsifu kwa kila machungu,
Ee- -Ee-, Ee- -Ee-, Ee- -Ee-
Maa-na yeye kanifanya nilivyo,
Ee- -Ee-, Ee- -Ee-, Ee- -Ee-

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Nitamsifu kwa upofu wangu,
Ee- -Ee-, Ee- -Ee-, Ee- -Ee-.
Maa-na yeye kanifanya nilivyo.
Ee- -Ee-, Ee- -Ee-, Ee- -Ee.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Nitamsifu kwa ugumba wangu,
Ee- -Ee-, Ee- -Ee-, Ee- -Ee-
Maa-na yeye kaniumba nilivyo,
Ee- -Ee-, Ee- -Ee-, Ee- -Ee-

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Ingawa watu wanicheka sana,
Ee- -Ee-, Ee- -Ee-, Ee- -Ee-
Sitachoka kumsifuMuumba,
Wa-ngu,.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Nitamsifu kwa magonjwa yangu,
Ee- -Ee-, Ee- -Ee-, Ee- Ee-
Maa-na yeye anajua yote,
Ee- -Ee-, Ee- -Ee-, Ee- -Ee-

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Ingawa watu wananitenga,
Ee- -Ee-, Ee- -Ee-, Ee- -Ee-
Yeye atanipokea kwake,
Mbinguni,
